Iron and Steel Companies (Amalgamation and Takeover Laws) Repeal Act, 2000_Section Preamble--> Act Objective: An Act to repeal the Iron and Steel Companies Amalgamation Act, 1952 and the Indian Iron and Steel Company (Taking Over of Management) Act, 1972. BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty-first Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
Iron and Steel Companies (Amalgamation and Takeover Laws) Repeal Act, 2000_Section 1--> This Act may be called the Iron and Steel Companies(Amalgamation and Takeover Laws) Repeal Act, 2000.
Iron and Steel Companies (Amalgamation and Takeover Laws) Repeal Act, 2000_Section 2--> The Iron and Steel Companies Amalgamation Act, 1952 and the Indian Iron and Steel Company(Taking Over of Management) Act, 1972 are hereby repealed. SUBHASH C. JAIN,Secretary to the Govt. of India.
